blog.name: mostlyanything19
blog.title: I'm just saying...
blog.description:
your local nonbinary lesbian | 26 | autistic | germany | she/her or they/them please | Lyan if you really need a name
Stuff you'll find here:
– Whatever the hell catches my fancy
– Fandom love! This includes CURRENTLY ABOUT 300% GOOD OMENS, Pacific Rim, Sherlock Holmes in any shape and form, Lotr/the Hobbit, my newly re-awakened love for Doctor Who, Star Trek TOS,
and more peripherally: Supernatural, the MCU, J2 (as pretty much the only actors I am actively About), Check, Please!, Ghostbusters and Black Sails, the X-Files, Ace Attorney, Merlin, and a whole bunch of others that come and go. Basically I have a lot of fandoms but I'm normally hyperfixating on one or two of the big ones at any given time. I tag everything.
Icon by: ashagrxyjoy

summary: Can we talk about the fact that every time I see Good Omens promo pics of the boys I flash back to watching Michael Sheen fail...
body:
Can we talk about the fact that every time I see Good Omens promo pics of the boys I flash back to watching Michael Sheen fail spectacularly on Celebrity Bake Off and imagine that it is exactly what would happen of Aziraphale was on Bake Off…

If you haven’t watched it, it is on youtube and you need to treat yourselves to the disasters that are Michael’s Welsh dragon cookies.

Brittany. 22.
Stannis Baratheon loyalist. 
Masters of Sex, Mad Men, A Song of Ice and Fire, and a shitload of other tv shows, movies, video games, history and the occasional old man. 
Michael Sheen is the supreme bae. 
Christoph Waltz and John Slattery get an honorable mention. 
Bobby Kennedy deserved better.

tags: and then there was that interview that confirmed that michael calls lizzy 'liz'
summary: Me randomly remembering that Michael Sheen woke up from a dental procedure while shooting season 2 of MoS, filmed himself while...
body: Me randomly remembering that Michael Sheen woke up from a dental procedure while shooting season 2 of MoS, filmed himself while still high, and the first video was him just saying romantic things about a Liz, and even though he tried to awkwardly explain it away as him talking about Liz Lemon, no one laughed, Sarah Silverman was still subtly miffed about it and then Chris Hardwick awkwardly tried to change the subject

reblog.comment: Me randomly remembering that Michael Sheen woke up from a dental procedure while shooting season 2 of MoS, filmed himself while still high, and the first video was him just saying romantic things about a Liz, and even though he tried to awkwardly explain it away as him talking about Liz Lemon, no one laughed, Sarah Silverman was still subtly miffed about it and then Chris Hardwick awkwardly tried to change the subject

trail.content_raw: Me randomly remembering that Michael Sheen woke up from a dental procedure while shooting season 2 of MoS, filmed himself while still high, and the first video was him just saying romantic things about a Liz, and even though he tried to awkwardly explain it away as him talking about Liz Lemon, no one laughed, Sarah Silverman was still subtly miffed about it and then Chris Hardwick awkwardly tried to change the subject
trail.content: Me randomly remembering that Michael Sheen woke up from a dental procedure while shooting season 2 of MoS, filmed himself while still high, and the first video was him just saying romantic things about a Liz, and even though he tried to awkwardly explain it away as him talking about Liz Lemon, no one laughed, Sarah Silverman was still subtly miffed about it and then Chris Hardwick awkwardly tried to change the subject

blog.name: l-i-n-u-s-k-a
blog.title: I am duck now
blog.description:
I usually post games, good omens, movies, cartoons, cute art and general stuff. I lost track if I'm honest.
My special interests include physics, literature, history, storytelling and everything that makes me laugh at the moment.
I have no knowledge of basic English
(if you're here for the Witcher then don't bother to follow at all)
++AZIRAPHALE ANTIS FUCK OFF++

summary:
Michael Sheen: *takes a deep breath*
Michael Sheen: Aziraphale lo-
Anyone who has read one of his interviews ever: Yes,...
body:
Michael Sheen: *takes a deep breath*

Michael Sheen: Aziraphale lo-

Anyone who has read one of his interviews ever: Yes, Aziraphale loves Crowley, we know. He loves Crowley so much, he’s the light of his life, he loves him so much. He just loves Crowley, we KNOW, Aziraphale loves Crowley, Aziraphale fucking loves Crowley, ok, we know, we get it, AZIRAPHALE LOVES CROWLEY. WE GET IT.

blog.name: azira-fucking-phale
blog.title: gayer than a treeful of monkeys on nitrous oxide
blog.description: laine  // they/them // good omens sideblog // queer // michael sheen said gay rights

summary: i really want to know who styled michael in bright young things because it’s honestly such a good reflection of his sexuality??...
body:
i really want to know who styled michael in bright young things because it’s honestly such a good reflection of his sexuality?? bear with me, but we see his style around his friends be more ‘flamboyant’ like these:

but then during the maitland ball we see him dressed in really dark clothing and his hair is straightened

and like obviously he can’t be open around his family and it just makes me sob thinking about it. but even more so when we see the final scene he’s in *spoilers*

even now he does still have some of his original ‘flamboyant’ style but it’s really, i guess you could say ‘watered down’ and his hair isn’t as curly and god i really don’t know if this was intentional but it’s something i think about constantly..
